Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The application id of the application producing the record.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The Spark User associated with the record.
Columns.Name: SparkUser

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the application was submitted.
Columns.Name: SubmissionTime

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the application submission completed.
Columns.Name: CompletionTime

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the application.
Columns.Name: ClusterTenantId

Columns.Description: The type of node running the application.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: The fqdn the node was run on.
Columns.Name: Host

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster running the application.
Columns.Name: ClusterDnsName

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster running the application.
Columns.Name: Region

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node running the application.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the application
Columns.Name: UserSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
